rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C118971

definition: A grouping of observations within the Clinical Classification domain.
name: Category of Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II (APACHE II) (Knaus WA, Draper EA, Wagner DP, Zimmerman JE. APACHE II: a severity of disease classification system. Critical Care Medicine 1985; 13(10):818-29).
terms.preferredTerm: Acute Physiology and Chronic Health Evaluation II Clinical Classification

terms.definition: The Body-Mass Index, Airflow Obstruction, Dyspnea, and Exercise Capacity Index (BODE Index) (Bartolome R. Celli, M.D., Claudia G. Cote, M.D., Jose M. Marin, M.D., Ciro Casanova, M.D., Maria Montes de Oca, M.D., Reina A. Mendez, M.D., Victor Pinto Plata, M.D., and Howard J. Cabral, Ph.D.; N Engl J Med 2004;350:1005-12).
terms.preferredTerm: The Body-Mass Index, Airflow Obstruction, Dyspnea, and Exercise Capacity Index Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Child-Pugh Classification (Guidance for Industry Pharmacokinetics in Patients with Impaired Hepatic Function: Study Design, Data Analysis, and Impact on Dosing and Labeling. U.S. Department of Health and Human Services; Food and Drug Administration; Center for Drug Evaluation and Research (CDER); Center for Biologics Evaluation and Research (CBER). May 2003, Clinical Pharmacology. http://www.fda.gov/downloads/Drugs/GuidanceComplianceRegulatoryInformation/Guidances/UCM072123.pdf; http://www.halaven.com/sites/default/files/ChildPugh_FlashCard.pdf).
Coronary Artery Dissection NHLBI Grade (Coronary Artery angiographic changes after PTCA: Manual of Operations NHBLI PTCA Registry 1985-6:9).
terms.preferredTerm: Coronary Artery Dissection NHLBI Grade Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Coronary Thrombus TIMI Grade (TIMI Definitions for Commonly Used Terms in Clinical Trials. Available at http://www.timi.org/wp-content/uploads/2010/10/TIMI-Definitions.pdf. Accessed November 30, 2013).
terms.preferredTerm: Coronary Thrombus TIMI Grade Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Model for End Stage Liver Disease (MELD) (Malinchoc M, Kamath PS, Gordon FD, Peine CJ, Rank J, ter Borg PC (April 2000). A model to predict poor survival in patients undergoing transjugular intrahepatic portosystemic shunts. Hepatology 31 (4): 864-71).
terms.preferredTerm: Model for End Stage Liver Disease Clinical Classification

terms.definition: Negative Symptom Assessment-16 (NSA-16) (Version 2.0, Copyright 2006, Larry Alphs, MD, PhD, All Right Reserved).
Stent Thrombosis Coronary ARC Grade (Cutlip DE, Windecker S, Mehran R, et al. Clinical End Points in Coronary Stent Trials : A Case for Standardized Definitions. Circulation. 2007;115:2344-2351).
terms.preferredTerm: Stent Thrombosis Coronary ARC Grade Clinical Classification
